mapper.select: select o.order_no as o_order_no , o.print_count as o_print_count, o.order_type as o_order_type, o.order_status as o_order_status, o.order_mode as o_order_mode , o.order_source as o_order_source, o.po_no as o_po_no, o.route_id as o_route_id , o.order_time as o_order_time, o.order_price as o_order_price, o.to_shop_id as o_to_shop_id, o.to_shop_name as o_to_shop_name, o.from_shop_id as o_from_shop_id, o.from_shop_name as o_from_shop_name, o.expected_time as o_expected_time, o.user_define1 as o_user_define1, o.user_define2 as o_user_define2, o.user_define3 as o_user_define3, o.release_status as o_release_status, o.priority as o_priority, o.carrier_id as o_carrier_id, o.carrier_name as o_carrier_name , o.place_discharge as o_place_discharge , o.zip_code as o_zip_code , o.contacts as o_contacts, o.mobile as o_mobile, o.receive_address as o_receive_address, o.vehicle_no as o_vehicle_no, o.onsignee_id as o_onsignee_id , o.onsign_name as o_onsign_name , o.descr as o_descr, o.memo as o_memo, o.created_name as o_created_name, o.i_shop_id as o_i_shop_id, o.i_id as o_i_id, o.i_name as o_i_name, o.i_address as o_i_address, o.i_contact as o_i_contact, o.i_tel as o_i_tel, o.supplier_id as o_supplier_id , o.supplier_name as o_supplier_name, o.supplier_address as o_supplier_address, o.supplier_contact as o_supplier_contact, o.supplier_tel as o_supplier_tel, o.supplier_zip_code as o_supplier_zip_code, o.address as o_address, o.volume as o_volume, o.delivery_time as o_delivery_time, o.place_loading as o_place_loading, o.route as o_route, d.so_detail_id as d_so_detail_id, d.order_no as d_order_no, d.line_no as d_line_no, d.category_code as d_category_code, d.category_name as d_category_name, d.product_type as d_product_type, d.bar_code as d_bar_code, d.brand_code as d_brand_code, d.brand_name as d_brand_name , d.goods_name as d_goods_name, d.sku as d_sku, d.parent_sku as d_parent_sku, d.property as d_property , d.lot_num as d_lot_num, d.line_status as d_line_status, d.user_define1 as d_user_define1, d.user_define2 as d_user_define2, d.user_define3 as d_user_define3, d.receive_time as d_receive_time, d.receive_qty as d_receive_qty, d.ordered_qty as d_ordered_qty, d.picked_qty as d_picked_qty, d.shipped_qty as d_shipped_qty, d.sub_qty as d_sub_qty, d.unit as d_unit, d.convert_qty as d_convert_qty, d.convert_unit as d_convert_unit, d.total_price as d_total_price, d.cost_price as d_cost_price, d.price as d_price, d.volume as d_volume, d.rate_precent as d_rate_precent, d.memo as d_memo, d.created_time as d_created_time, d.updated_time as d_updated_time from doc_order_header o left join doc_order_details d on d.order_no = o.order_no where o.order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select order_no from doc_order_header where order_no like concat(#{orderNo},'%') order by order_no desc
